questions: _  plays soccer every day in Leo's family.
article:
Leo is thirteen years old. He has a brother and a sister. He has 10 tennis bats, 8 baseballs, 6 ping-pong balls, 12 soccer balls and 18 volleyballs, but he never  plays sports. His brother, Neal likes soccer . He is a member  of the city soccer club. He plays soccer every day with his friends. His sister, Nancy likes volleyball, but she doesn't play it.
,,.
